catList: Bioinformatics and Natural Language Processing After a review of the basics concepts and approaches of both bioinformatics and natural language processing, students will each read and present a seminar paper in these disciplines. Each presentation will be followed by a discussion session. At the end of the course, teams of students will be expected to write summary reports on their suggestions on how these two disciplines may benefit from each other in solving their respective problems.
